## Course Overview {.center}

::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="60%"}
### What You'll Learn

- **Data Quality Assessment** - Understanding and improving data reliability
- **Interpretable Models** - Making AI and ML decisions transparent
- **Statistical Analysis** - Descriptive and inferential statistics
- **Data Visualization** - Creating compelling business dashboards
- **Decision Trees & DOT** - Visual decision modeling
- **Communication** - Effectively presenting analytical insights

## Course Objectives {.center}

### By the End of This Course, You Will:

1. **Analyze** business data using appropriate statistical methods
2. **Design** and create interpretable data models
3. **Evaluate** data quality and implement improvement strategies
4. **Communicate** insights effectively to business stakeholders
5. **Apply** interpretable ML to solve business problems
6. **Avoid** common analytical pitfalls and biases

::: {.notes}
Emphasize the practical, hands-on nature of the course and real-world applications.
:::

## Course Structure {.center}

### Weekly Format

- **Lectures** (2 hours/week) - Theory and concepts
- **1-Hour Challenges** - Hands-on practice with real data
- **Individual Portfolios** - Document your learning journey
- **Tool Mastery** - GitHub, Cursor AI, Quarto, R, Python, DOT
- **Final Project** - Comprehensive portfolio showcase
